TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Roles extends System.Object
public ref class Roles abstract sealed

summary.span: 管理角色中的使用者成員資格，以在 ASP.NET 應用程式中執行授權檢查。

span.span: Manages user membership in roles for authorization checking in an ASP.NET application.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 角色管理可讓您管理您的應用程式使用者群組，稱為角色為基礎的授權。ASP.NET role management enables you to manage authorization for your application based on groups of users, referred to as roles. 將使用者指派至角色，您可以控制存取不同的組件或根據角色而不是或，Web 應用程式的功能來指定使用者名稱為基礎的授權。By assigning users to roles, you can control access to different parts or features of your Web application based on role instead of, or in addition to, specifying authorization based on user name. 例如，員工應用程式可能有角色，例如經理、 員工、 導演，依此類推，其中每個角色指定不同的權限。For example, an employee application might have roles such as Managers, Employees, Directors, and so on, where different privileges are specified for each role. 使用者可以屬於多個角色。Users can belong to more than one role. 例如，如果您的網站是討論論壇，某些使用者可能角色的成員和仲裁。For example, if your site is a discussion forum, some users might be in the role of both Members and Moderators. 您可以在網站上，有不同權限的每個角色定義，而這兩種角色的使用者會擁有兩組權限。You might define each role to have different privileges on the site, and a user who is in both roles would then have both sets of privileges. 若要啟用角色管理 ASP.NET 應用程式，使用的項目`system.web`主題應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中，如下列範例所示。To enable role management for your ASP.NET application, use the element of the `system.web` section in the Web.config file for your application, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` Web 應用程式組態檔中或以程式設計方式在程式碼中，您可以指定授權規則。You can specify authorization rules in the configuration file for your Web application or programmatically in your code. 比方說，Web.config 檔案中的下列區段需要使用者登入 （透過拒絕匿名使用者），，然後只允許使用者具有存取權的系統管理員角色中。For example, the following section from a Web.config file requires users to log on (by denying anonymous users), and then allows only users in the Administrators role to have access. ``` ``` 如果您使用`authorization`區段來指定角色，應用程式的使用者為基礎的授權應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中必須提供已驗證的使用者身分識別。If you use the `authorization` section in your application's Web.config file to specify authorization based on roles, users of your application must supply an authenticated user identity. 您可以使用 Windows 或表單驗證來驗證使用者。You can authenticate users by using either Windows or Forms authentication. 匿名使用者不能指派給角色。Anonymous users cannot be assigned to a role. 可以使用角色，獨立的或與 ASP.NET 搭配類別。Roles can be used independently of, or in conjunction with, the ASP.NET classes. 若要以程式設計的方式確認角色成員資格，您可以使用類別或屬性方法，或者您可以使用屬性方法。To verify role membership programmatically, you can use the class or the property with the method, or you can use the property with the method. 以程式設計方式檢查角色成員資格的範例程式碼，請參閱本主題中的範例 > 一節。For sample code that programmatically checks role membership, see the Example section in this topic. 類別也可讓您建立和刪除角色並將使用者加入或從角色移除使用者。The class also enables you to create and delete roles and to add users to or remove users from roles. > [!NOTE] > 如果您已設定應用程式使用類別，您無法修改角色或角色成員資格。If you have configured your application to use the class, you cannot modify roles or role membership. 單獨 classverifies Windows 安全性中的成員資格群組。The classverifies membership in Windows security groups only. 在此情況下，您必須使用 Windows 使用者帳戶管理，而不是 ASP.NET 角色來建立和刪除群組及管理群組成員資格。In this case, you must use Windows user account management rather than ASP.NET roles to create and delete groups and manage group membership. 您可以儲存角色資訊在數個資料來源。You can store role information in several data sources. - 您可以使用擷取角色資訊的類別，根據 Windows 群組的成員資格。You can use the class to retrieve role information based on membership in Windows groups. - 您也可以使用 SQL Server 資料庫中儲存角色資訊類別。You can store role information in a SQL Server database by using the class. - 如果您有現有的角色資訊，或想要儲存中的角色資訊及擷取角色資訊從 Windows、 授權存放區或 SQL Server 以外的資料來源，您可以藉由建立繼承實作自訂角色提供者抽象類別。If you have existing role information, or want to store role information in and retrieve role information from a data source other than Windows, an Authorization Store, or SQL Server, you can implement a custom role provider by creating a class that inherits the abstract class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作角色提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d)。For more information, see [Implementing a Role Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d). 如果使用者的瀏覽器接受 cookie，您可以在使用者的電腦上的 cookie 中儲存該使用者的角色資訊。If a user's browser accepts cookies, you can store role information for that user in a cookie on the user's computer. 每個頁面要求時，ASP.NET 會讀取該使用者的角色資訊 cookie 中。On each page request, ASP.NET reads the role information for that user from the cookie. 這可以改善應用程式效能降低的通訊所需要的資料來源擷取角色資訊。This can improve application performance by reducing the amount of communication required with the data source to retrieve role information. 如果太長，無法在 cookie 中儲存使用者的角色資訊，ASP.NET 就只是最近使用的角色資訊儲存在 cookie 中，並接著會尋找所需的資料來源中的其他角色資訊。If the role information for a user is too long to store in a cookie, ASP.NET stores just the most recently used role information in the cookie and then looks up additional role information in the data source as required. 如果使用者的瀏覽器不支援 cookie，或已停用 cookie，角色資訊不會快取 cookie。If the user's browser does not support cookies or cookies are disabled, role information is not cached in a cookie. 您可以藉由指定在 cookie 中快取的角色名稱的可靠性來改善屬性，當您設定 ASP.NET 角色。You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure ASP.NET roles. 預設值是`All`，它會加密在 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。The default is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. ## Examples 下列範例示範設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和 ASP.NET 角色且使用的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案成員資格和角色的資訊儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫。The following example shows the Web.config file for an application configured to use both ASP.NET membership and ASP.NET roles and to use the to store membership and role information in a SQL Server database. 只有系統管理員角色的使用者，才允許存取應用程式和與表單驗證來驗證使用者。Users are authenticated with forms authentication and only users in the Administrators role are allowed access to the application. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視其他使用者的角色。The following code example programmatically checks whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view other users' roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫預設角色提供者指定的使用者與資料來源指定的角色建立關聯。The method calls the default role provider to associate the specified users with the specified role at the data source. 如果您的應用程式使用類別，會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法在交易內進行。If your application uses the class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果發生錯誤，例如使用者名稱已在指定的角色，會回復交易，會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. > [!NOTE] > 使用者名稱和角色名稱不能包含逗號。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將一個或多個使用者加入角色，或從根據使用者輸入的角色移除使用者。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role based on user input. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . .property string ApplicationName
Public Shared Property ApplicationName As String
public: static property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存及擷取角色資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

value.span: 要儲存和擷取角色資訊的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供與不同的應用程式的使用者和角色的類別。The property is used by the class to associate users and roles with different applications. 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料來源來儲存使用者和角色資訊而不重複的使用者名稱或重複的角色名稱之間發生衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same data source to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or duplicate role names. 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料來源，藉由指定相同值的屬性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source by specifying the same value in the property. 您可以設定屬性以程式設計的方式，或者您可以設定它以宣告方式在 Web 應用程式的組態檔中使用`applicationName`屬性。You can set the property programmatically, or you can set it declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果 Web 應用程式使用如未指定類別和實值`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性目前屬性值屬性使用。If your Web application is using the class and a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, the property value for the current property is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設角色提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 您應該避免撰寫程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定屬性，除非必要否則。You should avoid writing code to allow users to set the property, unless required. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理角色的多個應用程式的資料。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用執行個體和設定`applicationName`屬性`MyApplication`。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `applicationName` attribute to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`在 Web.config 檔案中，每個使用者角色資訊儲存在 cookie 中。When the property is set to `true` in the Web.config file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie. 當角色管理檢查使用者為特定角色時，角色提供者會檢查資料來源的角色清單在呼叫之前，會檢查角色 cookie。When role management checks to see whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before the role provider is called to check the list of roles at the data source. Cookie 會動態更新快取最近驗證過的角色名稱。The cookie is dynamically updated to cache the most recently validated role names. 您可以藉由指定在 cookie 中快取的角色名稱的可靠性來改善屬性，當您設定 ASP.NET 角色。You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure ASP.NET roles. 預設值是`All`，它會加密在 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。The default is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. > [!NOTE] > 因為除了資料來源，可以在快取角色名稱，很可能在資料來源的角色管理變更不會反映在快取值。Because role names can be cached apart from the data source, it is possible that changes to role management at the data source would not be reflected in the cached values. 在此情況下，使用者必須關閉再重新開啟瀏覽器清除快取的 cookie 值。In this case, the user must close and re-open their browser to clear the cached cookie value. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用執行個體和設定`cacheRolesInCookie`屬性`true`。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute to `true`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回角色中的使用者清單，其中使用者名稱包含相符項目所提供`usernameToMatch`設定`applicationName`。 returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為 「 使用者 」，則"user1"、"user2"、"user3，「 使用者，而且會傳回等等。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user," then the users "user1," "user2," "user3," and so on are returned. 依使用者名稱以字母順序傳回使用者。Users are returned in alphabetical order by user name. 執行使用 LIKE 子句針對其搜尋`usernameToMatch`參數。The performs its search using a LIKE clause against the `usernameToMatch` parameter. LIKE 子句可用於中的 SQL Server 所支援任何萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數值。Any wildcards that are supported by SQL Server in LIKE clauses can be used in the `usernameToMatch` parameter value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用根據使用者輸入的方法，以顯示角色成員資格。The following code example uses the method to display role membership based on user input. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您直接參考應用程式的預設角色提供者。The property enables you to directly reference the default role provider for an application. 這通常用來存取自訂角色提供者的成員不屬於抽象類別。This is commonly used to access custom members of the role provider that are not part of the abstract class. 例如，類別包含的多載方法可讓您判斷使用者是否在一般的 Windows 角色中，使用列舉值。For example, the class includes an overload of the method that enables you to determine whether a user is in a common Windows role by using a enumeration value. 參考類別應用程式可以使用來取得屬性，且可以轉換成為了參考多載。A reference to the class for an application can be obtained by using the property and can be cast as a in order to refer to the overload. 如果多個角色提供者設定應用程式，您可以存取不同的角色提供者使用集合。If multiple role providers are configured for an application, you can access different role providers using the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會轉換為預設角色提供者，做為和檢查目前登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，再允許使用者檢視應用程式的角色設定。The following code example casts the default role provider as a and checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles settings for the application. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫預設角色提供者，從在資料來源指定的角色中移除指定的使用者。The method calls the default role provider to remove the specified user from the specified roles at the data source. 如果應用程式設定為使用類別，會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法在交易內進行。If the application is configured to use the class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果發生錯誤，例如使用者名稱不在指定的角色，會回復交易，會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is not in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來移除一個或多個角色的使用者。The following code example uses the method to remove a user from one or more roles. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫`RoleExists`方法來判斷角色名稱是否存在於應用程式的資料來源中所指定的預設角色提供者屬性。The method calls the `RoleExists` method of the default role provider to determine whether a role name exists in the data source for the application that is specified in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來判斷角色名稱是否已存在於之前建立的角色。The following code example uses the method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
